rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {1}{G}{W} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Reach
[i]Fallen Star [/i]– Whenever Claude engages or an ability you control causes an opponent to draw a card, prevent all damage target creature would deal until your next turn.
